alert.note: Alert for Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 12:36PM EDT until May 17 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1236 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crawfordville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, Crawfordville, St. Marks, Wakulla, Newport, Shadeville, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Arran and Bethel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
